                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>9</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="width: 21.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1017.91em, 2.83em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-56"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-71"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1000.86em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-79"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-87"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.07em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-89"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>9</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">3\alpha,\ 9\alpha\therefore3\alpha+9\alpha=-\frac{q}{p}\Rightarrow12\alpha=\frac{-q}{p}\therefore\alpha=-\frac{q}{12p} </script></span></p>

<p>এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>.9</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>27.</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="width: 18.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.084em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1015.08em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-93"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.875em; left: 2.625em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mn>.9</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>27.</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>r</mi><mi>p</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">3\alpha.9\alpha=\frac{r}{p}\Rightarrow27\alpha^2=\frac{r}{p}\Rightarrow27.\left(\frac{-q}{12p}\right)^2=\frac{r}{p} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>27</mn><mi>p</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>144</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>144</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="width: 21.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1017.71em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-130"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">27</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-134"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">144</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-139"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">27</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-145"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">144</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-154"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>27</mn><mi>p</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>144</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>144</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\Rightarrow27pq^2=144p^2r\Rightarrow27q^2=144pr\Rightarrow3q^2=16pr</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 2 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="width: 12.483em;                         <span>Question 3 </span>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="width: 24.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1019.76em, 6.518em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.223em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\left(x^2\right)^2+2a^2x^2+\left(a^2\right)^2-3a^2x^2=0\\
\Rightarrow\left(x^2+a^2\right)^2=3a^2x^2 \Rightarrow x^2+a^2=\ \pm\sqrt3\ ax </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.1.</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="width: 19.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.027em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.03em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-288"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.223em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1003.65em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-293"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-295"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-297"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4.1.</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\therefore D=\left(\pm\sqrt3\ a\right)^2-4.1.a^2=3a^2-4a^2=-a^2 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.91em, 2.215em, -999.998em); </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-486"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-487"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>d</mi></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">=\frac{1}{ad-bc}\ \left[\begin{matrix}d&-b\\-c&a\\\end{matrix}\right] </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 5 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোন শর্তে &nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="width: 11.552em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.465em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1009.43em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-491"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-492"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-497"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূল 3টি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1002.01em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-534"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\alpha,-\alpha </script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="width: 11.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1009.76em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-540"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>β</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\beta\therefore\alpha-\alpha+\beta=p\Rightarrow\beta=p </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="width: 8.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-555"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-557"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">-\alpha^2-\alpha\beta+\alpha\beta=q </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="width: 4.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1003.77em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-569"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-572"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31"> \therefore-\alpha^2=q</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="width: 8.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1006.89em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-578"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">-\alpha^2\beta=r\ \therefore pq=r </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>R&nbsp;একটি&nbsp;rotational matrix,&nbsp;&nbsp;যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="width: 0.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.37em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-739"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\theta</script></span>&nbsp;কোণে ঘড়ির কাঁটার বিপরীত দিকে ঘুরে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mtd><mtd><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="width: 32.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1026.27em, 4.059em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\therefore R^4=\left(\begin{matrix}\cos{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}&-\sin{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}\\\sin{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}&\cos{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}\\\end{matrix}\right) 
=\left(\begin{matrix}cos4\theta&-sin4\theta\\sin4\theta&cos4\theta\ \\\end{matrix}\right) 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="width: 4.696em;             <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="width: 9.019em; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.594em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; clip: rect(3.076em, 1030em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.58em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.41em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-966"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-970"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-971"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.41em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-979"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-980"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-981"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>;</mo><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\alpha=\sqrt{-5}-1\Rightarrow\bar{\alpha}=-\sqrt{-5}-1 \\ \therefore\alpha+\bar{\alpha}=-2; \alpha\bar{\alpha}=6 \therefore x^2-\left(\alpha+\bar{\alpha}\ \right)x+\alpha\bar{\alpha}=0\Rightarrow x^2+2x+6=0</script></span></p>

<p>Or&nbsp;Option Check.</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 8 </span>

    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 9 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>z</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="width: 15.874em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.005em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1013em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1302"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.151em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>z</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">a\times b,\ b\times c,\ c\times d,......y\times z</script></span>&nbsp;ক্রমের 25&nbsp;টি ম্যাট্রিক্স পরপর গুণ করলে গুণফলের ক্রম কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 10 </span>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">B=\left[\begin{matrix}a&b\\c&d\\\end{matrix}\right]\therefore AB=\left[\begin{matrix}a+2c&b+2d\\4a+3c&4b+3d\\\end{matrix}\right]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>14</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="width: 24.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1020.12em, 6.191em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1539"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.125em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1019.8em, 4.51em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">14</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.548em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>14</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\therefore a+2c=5,\ \ 4a+3c=12\ \rightarrow a=\frac{9}{5},\ \ c=\frac{8}{5} \\ \therefore b+2d=7,\ \ 4b+3d=14\ \rightarrow b=\frac{7}{5},\ \ d=\frac{14}{5} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 11 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1605" style="width: 8.869em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1606"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1607"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;
