width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1612"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                             <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দুইটি মূল বাস্তব, দুইটি মূলই কাল্পনিক</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1694"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>±</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">
\pm1 </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.23em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1698"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\pm3 </script></span></p>

                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1753" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.248em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.303em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>;</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mrow><mo>|</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>216</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\left|A\right|=x^2-10; \\
\left|A^3\right|=\left|A\right|^3=\left(x^2-10\right)^3=216 \\
\Rightarrow x^2-10=6\Rightarrow x^2=16\therefore x=\pm 4 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 13 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.55em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1771"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">x^4-1=y </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণটি x&nbsp;অক্ষকে কয়টি বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2&nbsp;টি</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>3&nbsp;টি</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>

                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4&nbsp;টি</p>
</label>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ছেদ করে না</p>
</label>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1779"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">y=0 </script></span>&nbsp;বসালে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="width: 8.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.52em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1784"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1785"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1786" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1791" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">x^4=1\Rightarrow x^2=\pm1 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="width: 1.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1798"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">(+)</script></span>&nbsp;নিয়ে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="width: 7.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1006.11em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1803"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1804"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">x^2=1\ \therefore x=\pm1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="width: 1.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1816"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">(-)</script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;নিয়ে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.87em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1821"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1822"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">x^2=-1 </script></span>&nbsp;এর কোনো বাস্তব সমাধান নেই।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1828" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1829"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;x&nbsp;অক্ষকে দুইটি বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 14 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.665em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.865em, 1005.4em, 4.473em, -999.998em); top: -3.426em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1832"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1833" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.635em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.6em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.618em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.296em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1838"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1839"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1840" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.6em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.296em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1847"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1848"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.43em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.18em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>ω</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">A=\left[\begin{matrix}\omega&0\\0&\omega\\\end{matrix}\right] </script></span>&nbsp;হয় তবে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2017</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="width: 4.622em;                     </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ω</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2017</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2017</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">A=\omega\left[\begin{matrix}1&0\\0&1\\\end{matrix}\right]\therefore A^{2017}=\omega^{2017}\left[\begin{matrix}1&0\\0&1\\\end{matrix}\right]=\omega I=A </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                        
                    </div>

                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22</mn></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="width: 4.738em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2007"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2008"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2010"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2011"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2016"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2017"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>22</mn></mrow></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">
a_{11}+a_{22} </script></span></p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ম্যাট্রিক্সের ট্রেস হলো মুখ্যকর্ণের উপাদানগুলোর যোগফল।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>All</p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2087" style="width: 2.953em;                     <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2160" style="width: 0.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.41em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2161"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">

                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">\alpha^2-a\alpha-b=0</script></span>&nbsp;বিয়োগ করে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2193" style="width: 23.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1019.1em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2194"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2195"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2197"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2198" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2200" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2202" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2204" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2206"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2207" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2209" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2214" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2216"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2217" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2219" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2221" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2223"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2224" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2231" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\left(a-b\right)\alpha-\left(a-b\right)=0  \Rightarrow\left(a-b\right)\left(\alpha-1\right)=0\Rightarrow\alpha=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2234" style="width: 11.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1009.67em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2235"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2236" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2239" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2241" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2244" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2245" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2247" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\therefore1-a-b=0\therefore a+b=1 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 18 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.088em, 1017.36em, 6.336em, -999.998em);                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2334" style="width: 18.404em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2335"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2336"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2341"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">x^2\left(x-2y\right)-xy\left(x-2y\right)+y^2\left(x-y\right)=64</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2443" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2449" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.298em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\Rightarrow x^3-2x^2y-x^2y+2xy^2+xy^2-y^3=64\Rightarrow x^3-3x^2y+3xy^2-y^3=64\\
\Rightarrow\left(x-y\right)^3=64\Rightarrow x-y=4\Rightarrow x=y+4
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 19 </span>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 21 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>64</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="width: 10.061em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2712" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2728" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2729"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2730"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.87em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2731"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2733"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2736" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\left(x+c\right)^3</script></span>&nbsp;একটি ঘনরাশি, প্রশ্নে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="width: 7.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.78em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2740"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2741"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">64</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>64</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-136">c^3=64\Rightarrow c=4</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-137-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>48</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>48</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2750" style="width: 29.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1024.39em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2751"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2752" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2753" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.95em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2754"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2756"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2763" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2765" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2768"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">48</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">64</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2785" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">48</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">36</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>48</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>64</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>48</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-137">\therefore\left(x+4\right)^3=x^3+12x^2+48x+64\ \therefore a=-12,\ \ b=48\ \therefore a+b=36</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">

class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-149">2x^2-7x+5=0\Rightarrow2x^2-2x-5x+5=0\Rightarrow2x\left(x-1\right)-5\left(x-1\right)=0\\ \Rightarrow\left(x-1\right)\left(2x-5\right)=0 ;x^2-4x+3=\left(x-3\right)\left(x-1\right)=0\\ \therefore\alpha=\frac{5}{2},\ \beta=1,\ \gamma=3 \therefore\ \frac{\gamma+\alpha}{\gamma-\alpha}=\frac{3+\frac{5}{2}}{3-\frac{5}{2}}=\frac{6+5}{6-5}=11:1 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>

                        <span>Question 23 </span>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3021" style="width: 15.911em;
