                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3047" style="width: 34.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 28.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1027.99em, 6.027em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3048"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 28.035em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1014.72em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3049" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3051" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.4em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3052"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3054"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3056" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.486em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3060" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3063" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3067" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3069"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3071" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1027.99em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -2.498em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3082"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3083"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3084" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3088" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3091" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3094" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3096"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3098" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3105" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3106" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3107" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3110" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3116" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">D=\left(2k+4\right)^2-4\left(1\right)\left(8k+1\right)=0 \\
\Rightarrow  4\left(k^2+4k+4\right)-4\left(8k+1\right)=0\Rightarrow  k^2-4k+3=0\ \therefore k=1,3</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 24 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>যদি&nbsp;A,B,Cযথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3122" style="width: 9.205em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.528em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1007.49em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3123"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">4×5,5×4,4×2</script></span>&nbsp;মাত্রার ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় তবে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="width: 7.416em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.075em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.08em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3136"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3138"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3139" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block;                 <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3151" style="width: 2.735em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.234em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.19em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3152"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">

</span>

    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 25 </span>

width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3245" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3247" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3250" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3252" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\left(\alpha+\beta\right)(\beta+\alpha)(\gamma+\alpha)</script></span>&nbsp;এর মান কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3268" style="width: 31.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 25.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1025.9em, 5.781em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3269"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 25.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1011.52em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3270" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3272" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3274" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3279" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3280" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3281" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1025.9em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.621em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-3285" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3286" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3287" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3289"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3290" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3292" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3294" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3296"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3297" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3299" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3301" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3303"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3304" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3306" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3309" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3311"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3313" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3316" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3320" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3325" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3329" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3330" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3331" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">11</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-166">\alpha+\beta+\gamma=0,\ \alpha\beta\gamma=-11\\ \therefore\left(\alpha+\beta\right)\left(\beta+\gamma\right)\left(\gamma+\alpha\right)=\left(-\gamma\right).\left(-\alpha\right).(-\beta)=-\alpha\beta\gamma=11 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
                        <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Engineering Daily Practice Exam</h4>
                            </div><div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mn>20</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>30</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>40</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>50</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 7.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.447em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.865em, 1006.19em, 4.473em, -999.998em); top: -3.426em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                         </div>
                                    </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="width: 10.061em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 5.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-256" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-257"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-260"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.8em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-261"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-262"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.846em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.223em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>.</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">x^4+a^2x^2+a^4=0\Rightarrow\left(x^2\right)^2+2a^2.x^2+\left(a^2\right)^2-a^2x^2=0  \\{\Rightarrow\left(x^2+a^2\right)}^2=a^2x^2  {\Rightarrow x}^2+a^2=\pm ax </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="width: 18.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1014.67em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-275"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.01em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-279"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-281"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.092em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-288"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>±</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">D=\left(\pm a\right)^2-4a^2=a^2-4a^2=-3a^2<0\ \ </script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-311"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;মূলদ্বয় জটিল।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>a, b, c&nbsp;ক্রমিক সমানুপাতী এবং এদের প্রত্যেকে অশুন্য বাস্তব সংখ্যা হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.19em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-314"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">ax^2+bx+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;সমীকরণের মূলদ্বয়-&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;double-struck&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="width: 6.373em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.218em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1005.11em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.494em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-327"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-328"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-330"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-340"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">R</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.498em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">R</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\left[a,\ b,\ c\in\mathbb{R}\right]</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জটিল অনুবন্ধী</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাস্তব অনুবন্ধী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমান</p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>a,&nbsp;b,&nbsp;c&nbsp;ক্রমিক সমানুপাতী বলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="width: 13.568em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1011.11em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-344"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-367"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">b^2=ca;\ \ \ D=b^2-4ca=-3b^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>D</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="width: 3.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1002.95em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-371"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>D</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\therefore  D<0</script></span>&nbsp;তাই, মূলদ্বয় জটিল অনুবন্ধী।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নির্ণয় সম্ভব নয়</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>36</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3024</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="width: 15.33em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="width: 11.314em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2441139</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="width: 5.658em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-774"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-775"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.584em, 1000.45em, 4.879em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 1.518em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-771"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-772"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-777"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2441139</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2441139</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\therefore A^{2441139}=\omega^{2441139}\left[\begin{matrix}1&0\\0&1\\\end{matrix}\right]=I </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="width: 8.869em;
