                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.34em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-798"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">y=x^2</script></span>,&nbsp;এখন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="width: 6.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-805"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-806"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">y^2-3y+1=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.618</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0.382</mn><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1008.08em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-817"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.618</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.382</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.618</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0.382</mn><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\therefore y=2.618,\ 0.382>0   </script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-828"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;চারটি মূলই বাস্তব।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.577em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.865em, 1009.35em, 4.473em, -999.998em); top: -3.426em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-831"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">(</span></span><span class="mtable" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="padding-right: 0.151em; margin-left: -0.967em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-837"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-838"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-840"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-842"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; \left(\begin{matrix}\cos{3\theta}&-\sin{3\theta}\\\sin{3\theta}&\cos{3\theta}\\\end{matrix}\right) 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>R&nbsp;একটি&nbsp;Rotation Matrix,&nbsp;যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="width: 0.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.37em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-989"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\theta</script></span>&nbsp;কোণে ঘড়ির কাঁটার বিপরীত দিকে ঘুরে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; margin-left: -1.227em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1067"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1070"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1072"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1074" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.34em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1084"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1085"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1087"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1089"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.543em, 1003.32em, 4.92em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 3.486em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1003.32em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.637em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1075"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1076"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1079"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1081"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.46em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.227em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-1092"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1093"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1095"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1097"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mtd><mtd><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\therefore R\times R\times R=\left(\begin{matrix}\cos{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}&-\sin{(\theta}+\theta+\theta)\\\sin{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}&\cos{\left(\theta+\theta+\theta\right)}\\\end{matrix}\right)
=\left(\begin{matrix}\cos{3\theta}&-\sin{3\theta}\\\sin{3\theta}&\cos{3\theta}\\\end{matrix}\right)  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;                                     </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; 5x^2-3x-1=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="width: 6.805em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="width: 2.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.52em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1269"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1004.22em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\therefore\alpha+\beta=5 </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="width: 3.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.12em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1284"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\alpha\beta=-3</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1291"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="width: 19.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.559em, 1015.78em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1294"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1295"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1301"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1302"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.264em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>β</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">x^2-\left(\frac{1}{\alpha}+\frac{1}{\beta}\right)+\frac{1}{\alpha\beta}=0\Rightarrow x^2+\frac{5}{3}x-\frac{1}{3}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="width: 8.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1006.72em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1337"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1338" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\therefore3x^2+5x-1=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 11 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="width: 16.731em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="width: 4.361em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>12</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="width: 2.666em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1383"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">x=\frac{1}{2} </script></span>&nbsp;বসিয়ে পাওয়া যায়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="width: 19.018em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">13</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\frac{4}{16}-\left(a-1\right).\frac{1}{8}+\frac{a}{4}-\frac{6}{2}+1=0\ \Rightarrow\ a=13</script></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.598em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">?</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>γ</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\alpha^3+\beta^3+\gamma^3=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1478" style="width: 38.814em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.543em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1517"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.97em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1526"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1528"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.051em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">}</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∑</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>∑</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\sum\alpha^3=\left(\sum a\right)\times\left\{\left(\sum a\right)^2-3\sum\alpha\beta\right\}+3\alpha\beta\gamma=\left(-2\right)\times\left\{\left(-2\right)^2-3\times3\right\}+3\times(-4)=-2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="width: 4.696em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.839em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.76em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1549"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1550"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.126em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.23em, 4.175em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1551"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.616em, 1001.31em, 3.877em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.985em; left: -0.073em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.985em; left: 0.598em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -3.985em; left: 0.263em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.094em, 1000.86em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\sqrt{-5}-1</script></span>&nbsp;মূলটি নিচের কোন সমীকরণের?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1606" style="width: 20.412em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1607"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1608" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1630" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1631" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1633" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1634"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1635"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1636" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.41em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1637" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1638" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\alpha=\sqrt{-5}-1\Rightarrow\bar{\alpha}=-\sqrt{-5}-1 \therefore\alpha+\bar{\alpha}=-2</script></span>;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="width: 23.568em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1019.26em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1642"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1643" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1644"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1645"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1646"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.41em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1658"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1662"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1663"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.41em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>α</mi><mo stretchy="false">¯</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92"> \alpha\bar{\alpha}=6 \therefore x^2-\left(\alpha+\bar{\alpha}\ \right)x+\alpha\bar{\alpha}=0\Rightarrow x^2+2x+6=0</script></span></p>

<p>Or, Option test.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="width: 8.348em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.82em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1006.78em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1690"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1692"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>25</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="width: 4.146em; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.82em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; ca=\frac{6}{25} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.38em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1732"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">2\alpha,\ 3\alpha</script></span></p>
