clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.182em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.848em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mn>.3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>6.</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mrow><mn>25</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>25</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\therefore2\alpha+3\alpha=-\frac{1}{a}\ \therefore\alpha=-\frac{1}{5a} \\

2\alpha.3\alpha=\frac{c}{a}\Rightarrow6.\left(-\frac{1}{5a}\right)^2=\frac{c}{a}\Rightarrow\frac{6}{25a^2}=\frac{c}{a}   \therefore a c=\frac{6}{25} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>b</mi></mfrac></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>c</mi></mfrac></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>c</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\left|\begin{matrix}bc&ca&ab\\\frac{1}{a}&\frac{1}{b}&\frac{1}{c}\\\frac{1}{b}+b&\frac{1}{c}+c&\frac{1}{a}+a\\\end{matrix}\right|=?	</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1942" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1944" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1945" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.895em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.053em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>b</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>c</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\frac{1}{abc}\left|\begin{matrix}bc&ca&ab\\bc&ca&ab\\\frac{1}{b}+b&\frac{1}{c}+c&\frac{1}{a}+a\\\end{matrix}\right|=0\ \left[r_1=r_2\right]</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.23em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2010"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-111">-9 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.28em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2014"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.058em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">
-7 </script></span></p>
</label>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="width: 7.297em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2030"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2031"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2041" style="width: 6.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1005.66em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2042"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2043" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2044" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2046" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115"> \therefore\alpha+\beta+\gamma=0 </script></span>&nbsp;বলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="width: 11.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1009.26em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2052"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\alpha+\beta=-\gamma\therefore\alpha+\beta=-4</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>A ম্যাট্রিক্সের দুটি বিপরীত ম্যাট্রিক্স B ও C হলে কোনটি সত্য?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2066" style="width: 5.922em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.829em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1004.78em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2067"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.23em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.276em;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">B+C=A</script></span></p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2078" style="width: 5.922em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.829em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1004.78em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2079"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2080" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2082" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.23em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2084" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.276em;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">B-C=A</script></span></p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>উপপাদ্য অনুসারে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="width: 2.78em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.279em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.596em, 1002.28em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2114"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.276em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূল দুইটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2119"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.653em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\alpha</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="width: 9.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1007.83em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2122"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2123"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2128"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2130" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.58em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2134" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2135" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2136" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>α</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>c</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\frac{1}{\alpha}\therefore\alpha\frac{1}{\alpha}=\frac{c}{a}\Rightarrow a=c</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>13</mn></mrow></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>23</mn></mrow></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>31</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>32</mn></mrow></msub></mtd><mtd><msub><mi>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>33</mn></mrow></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2499" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2500" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2501"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2502"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2503" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2507" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2510" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2513" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2515"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2517" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1012.79em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -2.416em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-2523" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2525" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-134">D=\left(2k+4\right)^2-4\left(1\right)\left(8k+1\right)=0\Rightarrow4\left(k^2+4k+4\right)-4\left(8k+1\right)=0\\
\Rightarrow k^2-4k+3=0\ \therefore k=1,3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>

vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>…</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-137">B=A_1A_2A_3\ldots..A_n </script></span>&nbsp;হয় তবে&nbsp;B&nbsp;এর মাত্রা কোনটি?</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-143-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>X</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; \left[\begin{matrix}11&3\\5&4\\\end{matrix}\right] 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>X</mi><mi>Y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">Y=\left[\begin{matrix}a&b\\c&d\\\end{matrix}\right]\ \therefore XY=\left[\begin{matrix}5a+4c&5b+4d\\3a+2c&3b+2d\\\end{matrix}\right]\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>41</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>5</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>49</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="width: 23.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1019.59em, 5.658em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2855"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.633em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1019.59em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">41</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">21</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1018.57em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -2.703em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">49</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2893" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">27</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.898em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>41</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>5</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>49</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">\therefore5a+4c=41,\ 3a+2c=21\rightarrow a=1,\ c=9\\
5b+4d=49,\ 3b+2d=27\rightarrow b=5,\ d=6
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2920" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2921"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2922" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">y=0 </script></span>&nbsp;বসালে আমরা পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2925" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.53em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2926"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2927"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2928" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2929" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2932" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2934" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">x^2+2x+5=0 </script></span>&nbsp;যার কোন বাস্তব সমাধান নেই,&nbsp;</p>

<p>কারণ নিশ্চায়ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2937" style="width: 1.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.23em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2938"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155"><0</script></span>;&nbsp;&nbsp;সুতরাং, এটি&nbsp; x-&nbsp;অক্ষকে কোন বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে না।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-156-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;             <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Engineering Weekly Live Exam</h4>
                            </div><div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 1 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">a=? </script></span>&nbsp;</p>

                </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="width: 14.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1011.93em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-44"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-45"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-47"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-54"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\left(a-2\right)\left(a-3\right)=12\ \ \therefore a=-1,\ 6 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 2 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোন শর্তে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.19em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-72"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-74"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">ax^2+bx+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর মূল দুইটির মান সমান কিন্তু বিপরীত চিহ্নযুক্ত হবে?</p>

                </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="width: 14.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1011.48em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-111"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-117"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>b</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\alpha,\ -\alpha; \alpha+\left(-\alpha\right)=-\frac{b}{a}\therefore b=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>7&nbsp;এর অনুরাশি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;
