display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1008.49em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.195em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-166"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="vertical-align: 1.436em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -1.883em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtable" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="padding-right: 0.166em; padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.584em, 1000.45em, 4.879em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-171"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-172"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-177"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-178"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.584em, 1000.45em, 4.92em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 1.518em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-174"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-175"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.277em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-180"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="vertical-align: 1.436em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -1.883em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">18</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.199em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">=\left|\begin{matrix}2&1\\4&9\\\end{matrix}\right|=18-4=14</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 4 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোন শর্তটি সঠিক হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="width: 16.395em;                 <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>.2</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1020.58em, 6.232em, -999.998em); width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>.2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">D=\left\{-2\left(a+d\right)\right\}^2-4\left(a^2+d^2\right).2 \\ =4\left(a^2+d^2\right)+8ad-8\left(a^2+d^2\right)=-4\left(a-d\right)^2 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-308"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;বাস্তব সংখ্যার ক্ষেত্রে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>&amp;#x2265;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.17em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-311"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">D\geq0 </script></span></p>

<p>এখানে&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>D</mi><mo>&amp;#x226F;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1002.17em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">≯</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>D</mi><mo>≯</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">D\ngtr 0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="width: 11.232em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>d</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\therefore-4\left(a-d\right)^2=0\therefore a=d</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 5 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.032em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.99em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-355"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-356"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">x^2-3x+2</script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="width: 4.771em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.914em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.84em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-365"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-366"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-368"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                 </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="width: 15.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1012.62em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-401"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-420"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">x^2-3x+2=\left(x-2\right)\left(x-1\right)\therefore2,\ 1 </script></span>&nbsp;দুটি মূল।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><msup><mn>.2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="width: 25.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1020.82em, 5.822em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-431"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1020.82em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1012.62em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.58em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-473"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><msup><mn>.2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">2^4-p.2^2+q=0\Rightarrow16-4p+q=0\cdots\cdots\cdots(i) \\
1-p+q=0\cdots\cdots\cdots\ \left(ii\right)\ ;\   
</script></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Cambria Math&quot;,serif"><m:r><m:rpr><m:scr m:val="roman"><m:sty m:val="p"></m:sty></m:scr></m:rpr>Solving&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0026;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="width: 12.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-481"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-482"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&amp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-491"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-498"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\left(i\right)\ \&\ \left(ii\right)\Rightarrow\left(p,\ q\right)\equiv\left(5,\ 4\right)</script></span></m:r></span></span></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 6 </span>

position: relative; width: 0.263em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.24em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -1.787em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -1.041em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.398em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.866em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\left|\begin{matrix}1&-\omega&\omega^2\\-\omega&\omega^2&1\\\omega^2&1&-\omega\\\end{matrix}\right|</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণায়কটির মান নিচের কোনটি? &nbsp;</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">

clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-680"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.436em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>ω</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\left|\begin{matrix}1&-\omega&\omega^2\\-\omega&\omega^2&1\\\omega^2&1&-\omega\\\end{matrix}\right|=1\times\left(-\omega^3-1\right)+\omega\left(\omega^2-\omega^2\right)+\omega^2\left(-\omega-\omega^4\right)    \\
=1\times\left(-2\right)+\omega^3\times\left(0\right)+\omega^3\times\left(-2\right)=-4     
</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 7 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="width: 0.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.46em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-730"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">
5 </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="width: 21.15em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="width: 20.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.477em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.273em, 1016.44em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-771"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-772"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 8 </span>

padding-left: 0.225em;">11</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">A^2+2A-11I=?</script></span></p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>17</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.232em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>17</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>17</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">A= \left[  \begin{matrix}  1 & 2 \\ 4 & -3    \end{matrix}\right] \Rightarrow A^2=  \left[  \begin{matrix}  9 & -4 \\ -8 & 17   \end{matrix}\right] \\
\therefore A^2+2A-11I=  \left[   \begin{matrix} 9+2-11 & -4+4 \\
-8+8 & 17-6-11    \end{matrix}   \right]   = \left[ \begin{matrix}   0 & 0 \\ 0& 0  \end{matrix}   \right]</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 9 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>A&nbsp;matrix&nbsp;এর বিপরীত&nbsp;matrix&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="width: 2.088em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.716em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1001.72em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1013"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.716em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">A^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করা যাবে যদি-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>A বর্গ ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="width: 3.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.144em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1021"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1022"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\left|A\right|\neq0 </script></span>&nbsp;হয়</p>
</label>
                        <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নির্ণায়ক,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="width: 3.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.144em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1029"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1030"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\left|A\right|\neq0 </script></span>&nbsp;হয় এবং কলাম ও সারির সংখ্যা ভিন্ন হয়</p>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>A&nbsp;বর্গ ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="width: 3.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.144em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1003.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1037"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1038"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\left|A\right|=0 </script></span>&nbsp;হয়</p>

        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>A matrix এর বিপরীত matrix&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="width: 1.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.39em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1045"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1046"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1048"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">A^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করা যাবে যদি A&nbsp;বর্গ ম্যাট্রিক্স হয় এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.54em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1059"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">|</mo></mrow><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">|A|\neq0</script></span>&nbsp;হয়। কারণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>j</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="width: 5.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.223em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1004.22em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1065"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1067"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">j</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.82em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1079"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 10 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="width: 8.981em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.342em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1007.3em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1084"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1086"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">3x^2+7x-2=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের মূল দুইটির যোগফল ও গুণফলের সমষ্টি কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
