            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="width: 24.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.559em, 1020.17em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1116"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1122"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1133"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1134" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1135" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1141"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1153"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1154"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1159" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\alpha+\beta=\frac{-7}{3};\ \ \alpha\beta=\frac{-2}{3}\ \therefore\left(\alpha+\beta\right)+\alpha\beta=-\left(\frac{7+2}{3}\right)=-3</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 11 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1163" style="width: 8.236em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.746em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1006.71em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1164"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1165"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">x^3+qx+r=0</script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের মূলগুলি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="width: 2.014em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="width: 6.723em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1245"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="width: 31.068em; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1317"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1360"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">	\frac{1}{\alpha+\beta-\gamma}+\frac{1}{\beta+\gamma-\alpha}+\frac{1}{\gamma+\alpha-\beta} =\frac{1}{-2\gamma}+\frac{1}{-2\alpha}+\frac{1}{-2\beta} =\frac{\alpha\beta+\beta\gamma+\gamma\alpha}{-2\alpha\beta\gamma} =\frac{q}{-2\left(-r\right)}=\frac{q}{2r}</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 12 </span>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">x^3-5x^2+17x-13=0\Rightarrow x^3-x^2-4x^2+4x+13x-13=0 \\
\Rightarrow x^2\left(x-1\right)-4x\left(x-1\right)+13\left(x-1\right)=0 \Rightarrow\left(x-1\right)\left(x^2-4x+13\right)=0    </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.13</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="width: 18.281em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1524"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1531"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
            </div>

                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 13 </span>

                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.82em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>i</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\left[\begin{matrix}i^2&-1&i^3\\1&i^4&0\\0&1&i\\\end{matrix}\right]</script></span>&nbsp;ম্যাট্রিক্সটির ট্রেস কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ট্রেস ম্যাট্রিক্স&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="width: 12.912em;                 <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 14 </span>

        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="width: 9.019em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="width: 19.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1015.9em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1716"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1718"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.05em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1719"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1721"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.133em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1730"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1740"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1748" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">3\left(-x\right)^2+2\left(-x\right)+6=0\Rightarrow3x^2-2x+6=0</script></span></p>

<p><strong>Alternate:</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.35em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1751"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1752" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1757"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1759" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\alpha+\beta=-\frac{2}{3}</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.46em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1761"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\alpha\beta=2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1767"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 31.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 26.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1026.11em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1771"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1777"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>α</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">x^2-\left(-\alpha-\beta\right)x+\left(-\alpha\right)\left(-\beta\right)=0\Rightarrow x^2-\frac{2}{3}x+2=0\Rightarrow3x^2-2x+6=0</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 15 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>A,&nbsp;B&nbsp;এবং C&nbsp;ম্যাট্রিক্সগুলোর মাত্রা যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="width: 6.298em;         </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="width: 2.735em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.234em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.19em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1852"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-111">2\times5</script></span></p>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1895"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="width: 5.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.18em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1898"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1899"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1901"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1902"><span style="display: inline-block; <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 16 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>k&nbsp;এর মান কত হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1914" style="width: 12.222em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.024em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1009.99em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1915"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1916"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.008em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1917" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1922"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">7</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1927" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.151em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">27</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">x^2-\left(k+7\right)x+27=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের একটি মূল অপরটির তিনগুণ হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ধরি, মূলদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1953" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.97em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1954"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1955" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\alpha,\ 3\alpha </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="width: 7.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.23em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1961"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1963"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">27</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">3\alpha^2=27, \alpha=\pm3 </script></span></p>

<p>এবং</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="width: 11.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.59em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1974"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">3\alpha+\alpha=k+7 , k=4\alpha-7 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.01em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1991"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\alpha=3 </script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="width: 2.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.93em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1996"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">k=5 </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.62em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2001"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">\alpha=-3</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="width: 3.65em;             </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 17 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>I</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2067" style="width: 24.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1019.8em, 5.576em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2068"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.838em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1019.8em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2069"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">I<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.798em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>I</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>I</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">A^{-1}=2A-3A^2-5I\Rightarrow I=2A^2-3A^3-5A \\ \therefore 3A^3-2A^2+5A+2I=0+I=I </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>P</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msubsup><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><msubsup><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2433" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2437" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2438" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2440" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2441"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.65em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.12em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2442"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2444"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2445" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.24em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2451"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2452" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.641em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 7.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>P</mi></mtd><mtd><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>P</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-147">= P(1-P)(1-P)\ \left|\begin{matrix}0&0&1\\1&1&P^2\\1+P&P(1+P)&P^4\\\end{matrix}\right|\\
=P\left(1-P\right)^2\left(P+P^2-1-P\right)=P\left(P-1\right)^2(P^2-1) </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div><div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Varsity Weekly MCQ Live Exam W-06 (10)</h4>
                            </div>
