                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="width: 7.666em; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">j</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\rm i=1,\ \ 2\ ;j=1,\ 2</script></span>&nbsp;বসিয়ে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2039" style="width: 1.314em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2045" style="width: 1.027em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>k এর মান কত হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ম্যাট্রিক্সটির নির্ণায়কের মান = 0&nbsp;;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>25</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2100" style="width: 25.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 21.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1020.86em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2101"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2102"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2104"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2109" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2111"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.77em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.773em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>25</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4.2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm \left(k-3\right)\left(k-2\right)-4=0\Rightarrow k^2-5k+2=0\Rightarrow k=\frac{5\pm\sqrt{25-4.2}}{2}\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2211" style="width: 2.498em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2216" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.23em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.058em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">-4 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>8</p>
</label>

                                </div>

MathJax_Main;">z</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.773em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.803em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mtd><mtd><mi>y</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>z</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd><mtd><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>z</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd><mtd><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>z</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\rm =\left|\begin{matrix}0&\begin{matrix}x\ \ \ \ \ &y\\\end{matrix}\\\begin{matrix}0\\-2z\\\end{matrix}&\begin{matrix}\begin{matrix}x\\z\\\end{matrix}&\begin{matrix}-y\\y+z\\\end{matrix}\\\end{matrix}\\\end{matrix}\right|\left[r_2^\prime=r_2-r_3\right]=-2z\left(-2xy\right)=4xyz</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2399" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1002.71em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2400"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\rm \therefore k=4</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="width: 11.109em; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2565" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2566" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">\rm \therefore A^2=8A-7I_2\therefore K=8</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-133">\rm ∆_r=\left|\begin{matrix}r-1&\begin{matrix}\ \ \ \ 6&\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ n\ \\\end{matrix}\\\begin{matrix}\left(r-1\right)^2\\\left(r-1\right)^3\\\end{matrix}&\begin{matrix}\begin{matrix}4n-2\\3n^2-3n\\\end{matrix}&\begin{matrix}2n^2\\3n^2\\\end{matrix}\\\end{matrix}\\\end{matrix}\right|</script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-139-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2730" style="width: 8.236em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2731"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2732"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2734" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.225em;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>নিশ্চায়ক,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="width: 5.248em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2743"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">\rm D=b^2-4c</script></span></p>

<p>মূলদ্বয়, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2752" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.36em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2753"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2754" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2756" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>β</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\alpha,\beta</script></span> হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="width: 14.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.68em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2758"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2759"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2761"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2762" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-142">\rm \left|\alpha-\beta\right|=1;\ \alpha+\beta=-b,\ \alpha\beta=c</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-143-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="width: 15.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1012.91em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2783"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2784"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.609em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.08em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2785"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2787"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2788" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.199em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2794" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2796" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2798" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.609em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.08em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2799"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2801"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2804" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.199em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-143">\rm \left(\alpha-\beta\right)^2=1^2\Rightarrow\left(\alpha+\beta\right)^2-4\alpha\beta=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-144-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2813" style="width: 10.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1008.49em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2814"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2816" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2818" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\rm \Rightarrow b^2-4c=1\Rightarrow D=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="width: 16.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1013.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2868"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2874"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2875"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2881"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2882"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2891"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2892"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2899"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2900"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-149">\rm tan\ 40° tan 5°=q ; tan40°+tan 5°=p</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="width: 14.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1011.6em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2905"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2907"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2909"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2911"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2912"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2915" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.26em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.17em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2916"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2917" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2918" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2919" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2920" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2921"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2922"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2923" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2925" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2926" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2927" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2928" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2929"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2930"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2931" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1004.59em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.375em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2932"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2933" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2934" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2935" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2936" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2937" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2939"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2940"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2941" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2942" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2943" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2944" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2945" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2946"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2947"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2948" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.84em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.838em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2952" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2953" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2954"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2955" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2956" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2957" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>40</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">\rm \tan{5}°=\frac{tan 40°+ tan 5°}{1-tan 40° tan 5°}⇒1=\frac{p}{1-q}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2958" style="width: 18.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.084em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1014.84em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2959"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2972" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">\rm\Rightarrow1-q=p\Rightarrow p+1=1\therefore p+q+1=2\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2981" style="width: 7.155em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.851em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.78em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2982"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2984" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2989" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">\rm f\left(x\right)=x^3+1</script></span> বক্ররেখাটি X&nbsp;অক্ষকে কয়বার ছেদ করে?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2994" style="width: 6.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.96em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2995"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2997" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3002" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3004" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">\rm f\left(x\right)=x^3+1;</script></span>&nbsp;X&nbsp;অক্ষকে ছেদ করলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3008" style="width: 8.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1006.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3009"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3014" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3016" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-154">\rm y=0\Rightarrow x^3+1=0\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>,</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3022" style="width: 7.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.781em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1005.78em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3023"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3030" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3031" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3032" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3033" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3034" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>,</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">\rm \Rightarrow x=-1,\omega,\omega^2</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;একটিমাত্র বাস্তব মান পাওয়া যায়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-156-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3035" style="width: 8.236em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3076" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3137" style="font-size: 70.7%;
