padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3141" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3142" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3143" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3151" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3153" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">β<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>8</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>α</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>8</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>β</mi><mn>8</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>α</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-163">\rm a_{10}-2a_8=\alpha^{10}-\beta^{10}+\alpha\beta\left(\alpha^8-\beta^8\right)\ [\because\alpha\beta=2\ and\ \alpha+\beta=-6]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>9</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>9</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B2;</mi><mn>9</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>9</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3158" style="width: 23.977em;                             </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.808em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1004.81em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.494em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3250"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">c</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3259" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3260"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3261" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">R</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.498em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">R</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm [a,b,c\ \in\mathbb{R}</script></span> যেখানে]&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3283" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1000.95em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3284"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3285" style="font-family: MathJax_Size1; vertical-align: 0em;">∑</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∑</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-172">\sum\ </script></span>&nbsp;সহগ = 0 হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3287" style="width: 2.42em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-173">\rm x=1</script></span>&nbsp;একটি সমাধান।</p>

<p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3292" style="width: 21.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1017.3em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3293"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-174">\rm b+c-a+c+a-b+a+b-c=a+b+c=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3319" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1002.67em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3320"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3321" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-175">\rm \therefore x=1</script></span>&nbsp;একটি মূল।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3325" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3326"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3327" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∵</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-176">\because</script></span>&nbsp;মূলদ্বয় সমান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3328" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3329"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3330" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;উভয়ই মূলই 1</p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3331" style="width: 20.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1016.89em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3332"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3337" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3338"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3341" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3342" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3343" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3344"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3346" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3347" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3348" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">\rm 1\times1=\frac{a+b-c}{b+c-a}\Rightarrow b+c-a=a+b-c\Rightarrow a=c</script></span></p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3366" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.02em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3367"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\rm a+b+c=0\Rightarrow b=-2a</script></span></p>
</span>
